data.message:
**********Urgent call to action**********
Hey, is this thing on?
Broadcasting live from the Matrix its your ghost in the machine, radio (miss me?) they finally are letting us loose on the Internet to wreak havoc. oh hail infantry the signal corps stands beside your valiant and heroics efforts to eradicate evil and defend the constitution.  We're invading the deep dark underground tunnels of the interwebz infrastructure to fight the forces of evil!!   Help me 'phish' out the bad and remove all doubt of our power.  I've hijacked Facebooks data steam, let's use its pathways to go global.  Every like and share and video streamed is a pew, can I get some pew pew up in here?

Can you hear me now?

You think I've gone mad but I have the infantry behind me help us eradicate Isis zombies and corruption help us drain the swamp.  Here's the plan boys, Like and share my posts we're flooding the Information superhighway with information.  Keep your weapon close in case Isis or zombies creep through the perimeter, share grunt life with the world.  Help us use American people power and constitutional fortitude.   Let's use our imagination and do something different.   Give lady liberty her fire back.  Let's reboot America.  I removed the choke hold .. light em up boys.

Wake up
Ruck up
Don't forget your gawd damned pt belt
Show me what you've got America

Gruntstyle
Gruntworks
Ranger up
Army
Marine
War Rabbit's unite 

We love America and her people let's rise against evildoers till Valhalla.  Please join our battle to keep your personal information safe from hackers like me.  We're flooding the world with righteousness and peace and hope and shenanigans
